verses.verse: כֹּ֚ה <S%H3541><s%> Thus אָמַ֣ר <S%H559><s%> Thus saith יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD הִנְנִי֙ <S%H2005><s%> I am going מֵעִ֣יר <S%H5782><s%> Behold I will raise up עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> against בָּבֶ֔ל <S%H894><s%> against Babylon וְאֶל־ <S%H413><s%> and against יֹשְׁבֵ֖י <S%H3427><s%> and against them that dwell לֵ֣ב <S%H3820><s%> in the midst קָמָ֑י <S%H6965><s%> of them that rise up ר֖וּחַ <S%H7307><s%> wind מַשְׁחִֽית׃ <S%H7843><s%> against me a destroying

וְשִׁלַּחְתִּ֨י <S%H7971><s%> And will send לְבָבֶ֤ל ׀ <S%H894><s%> unto Babylon זָרִים֙ <S%H2114><s%> fanners וְזֵר֔וּהָ <S%H2219><s%> that shall fan וִיבֹקְק֖וּ <S%H1238><s%> her and shall empty אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> אַרְצָ֑הּ <S%H776><s%> her land כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> for הָי֥וּ <S%H1961><s%> become עָלֶ֛יהָ <S%H5921><s%> will be opposed מִסָּבִ֖יב <S%H5439><s%> they shall be against her round about בְּי֥וֹם <S%H3117><s%> for in the day רָעָֽה׃ <S%H7451><s%> of trouble

אֶֽל־ <S%H413><s%> Nor יִדְרֹ֤ךְ <S%H1869><s%> let the archer [יִדְרֹךְ <S%H1869><s%> bend כ] הַדֹּרֵךְ֙ <S%H1869><s%> bend קַשְׁתּ֔וֹ <S%H7198><s%> his bow וְאֶל־ <S%H408><s%> nay יִתְעַ֖ל <S%H5927><s%> and against [him that] lifteth himself up בְּסִרְיֹנ֑וֹ <S%H5630><s%> in his brigandine וְאַֽל־ <S%H413><s%> Nor תַּחְמְלוּ֙ <S%H2550><s%> and spare אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> Nor בַּ֣חֻרֶ֔יהָ <S%H970><s%> ye not her young men הַחֲרִ֖ימוּ <S%H2763><s%> destroy ye utterly כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all צְבָאָֽהּ׃ <S%H6635><s%> all her host

וְנָפְל֥וּ <S%H5307><s%> shall fall חֲלָלִ֖ים <S%H2491><s%> Thus the slain בְּאֶ֣רֶץ <S%H776><s%> in the land כַּשְׂדִּ֑ים <S%H3778><s%> of the Chaldeans וּמְדֻקָּרִ֖ים <S%H1856><s%> and [they that are] thrust through בְּחוּצוֹתֶֽיהָ׃ <S%H2351><s%> in her streets

כִּ֠י <S%H3588><s%> Although לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> neither אַלְמָ֨ן <S%H488><s%> [hath] not [been] forsaken יִשְׂרָאֵ֤ל <S%H3478><s%> For Israel וִֽיהוּדָה֙ <S%H3063><s%> nor Judah מֵֽאֱלֹהָ֔יו <S%H430><s%> of his God מֵֽיְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD צְבָא֑וֹת <S%H6635><s%> of hosts כִּ֤י <S%H3588><s%> Although אַרְצָם֙ <S%H776><s%> though their land מָלְאָ֣ה <S%H4390><s%> was filled אָשָׁ֔ם <S%H817><s%> with sin מִקְּד֖וֹשׁ <S%H6918><s%> against the Holy One יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <S%H3478><s%> of Israel

נֻ֣סוּ ׀ <S%H5127><s%> Flee out מִתּ֣וֹךְ <S%H8432><s%> of the midst בָּבֶ֗ל <S%H894><s%> of Babylon וּמַלְּטוּ֙ <S%H4422><s%> and deliver אִ֣ישׁ <S%H376><s%> every man נַפְשׁ֔וֹ <S%H5315><s%> his soul אַל־ <S%H408><s%> not תִּדַּ֖מּוּ <S%H1826><s%> be not cut off בַּעֲוֹנָ֑הּ <S%H5771><s%> in her iniquity כִּי֩ <S%H3588><s%> for עֵ֨ת <S%H6256><s%> for this [is] the time נְקָמָ֥ה <S%H5360><s%> vengeance הִיא֙ <S%H1931><s%> this לַֽיהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD'S גְּמ֕וּל <S%H1576><s%> unto her a recompence ה֥וּא <S%H1931><s%> this מְשַׁלֵּ֖ם <S%H7999><s%> he will render לָֽהּ׃

כּוֹס־ <S%H3563><s%> cup זָהָ֤ב <S%H2091><s%> [hath been] a golden בָּבֶל֙ <S%H894><s%> Babylon בְּיַד־ <S%H3027><s%> hand יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> in the LORD'S מְשַׁכֶּ֖רֶת <S%H7937><s%> drunken כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all הָאָ֑רֶץ <S%H776><s%> that made all the earth מִיֵּינָהּ֙ <S%H3196><s%> of her wine שָׁת֣וּ <S%H8354><s%> have drunken גוֹיִ֔ם <S%H1471><s%> the nations עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> and כֵּ֖ן <S%H3651><s%> after that יִתְהֹלְל֥וּ <S%H1984><s%> are mad גוֹיִֽם׃ <S%H1471><s%> therefore the nations

פִּתְאֹ֛ם <S%H6597><s%> is suddenly נָפְלָ֥ה <S%H5307><s%> fallen בָבֶ֖ל <S%H894><s%> Babylon וַתִּשָּׁבֵ֑ר <S%H7665><s%> and destroyed הֵילִ֣ילוּ <S%H3213><s%> howl עָלֶ֗יהָ <S%H5921><s%> over קְח֤וּ <S%H3947><s%> for her take צֳרִי֙ <S%H6875><s%> balm לְמַכְאוֹבָ֔הּ <S%H4341><s%> for her pain אוּלַ֖י <S%H194><s%> Perhaps תֵּרָפֵֽא׃ <S%H7495><s%> if so be she may be healed

[רִפִּאנוּ כ] (רִפִּ֣ינוּ <S%H7495><s%> healing ק) אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> בָּבֶל֙ <S%H894><s%> Babylon וְלֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> not נִרְפָּ֔תָה <S%H7495><s%> We would have healed עִזְב֕וּהָ <S%H5800><s%> forsake וְנֵלֵ֖ךְ <S%H1980><s%> go אִ֣ישׁ <S%H376><s%> every one לְאַרְצ֑וֹ <S%H776><s%> into his own country כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> for נָגַ֤ע <S%H5060><s%> reacheth אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to הַשָּׁמַ֙יִם֙ <S%H8064><s%> unto heaven מִשְׁפָּטָ֔הּ <S%H4941><s%> for her judgment וְנִשָּׂ֖א <S%H5375><s%> and is lifted up עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> to the very שְׁחָקִֽים׃ <S%H7834><s%> [even] to the skies

הוֹצִ֥יא <S%H3318><s%> hath brought forth יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3069><s%> God אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> צִדְקֹתֵ֑ינוּ <S%H6666><s%> our righteousness בֹּ֚אוּ <S%H935><s%> come וּנְסַפְּרָ֣ה <S%H5608><s%> and let us declare בְצִיּ֔וֹן <S%H6726><s%> in Zion אֶֽת־ <S%H853><s%> מַעֲשֵׂ֖ה <S%H4639><s%> the work יְהוָ֥ה <S%H3069><s%> God אֱלֹהֵֽינוּ׃ <S%H430><s%> our God

הָבֵ֣רוּ <S%H1305><s%> Make bright הַחִצִּים֮ <S%H2671><s%> the arrows מִלְא֣וּ <S%H4390><s%> gather הַשְּׁלָטִים֒ <S%H7982><s%> the shields הֵעִ֣יר <S%H5782><s%> hath raised up יְהוָ֗ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> ר֙וּחַ֙ <S%H7307><s%> the spirit מַלְכֵ֣י <S%H4428><s%> of the kings מָדַ֔י <S%H4074><s%> of the Medes כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> Because עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> is against בָּבֶ֥ל <S%H894><s%> [is] against Babylon מְזִמָּת֖וֹ <S%H4209><s%> for his device לְהַשְׁחִיתָ֑הּ <S%H7843><s%> to destroy כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> Because נִקְמַ֤ת <S%H5360><s%> it because it [is] the vengeance יְהוָה֙ <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD הִ֔יא <S%H1931><s%> he נִקְמַ֖ת <S%H5360><s%> the vengeance הֵיכָלֽוֹ׃ <S%H1964><s%> of his temple

אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> against חוֹמֹ֨ת <S%H2346><s%> upon the walls בָּבֶ֜ל <S%H894><s%> of Babylon שְׂאוּ־ <S%H5375><s%> Set up נֵ֗ס <S%H5251><s%> the standard הַחֲזִ֙יקוּ֙ <S%H2388><s%> strong הַמִּשְׁמָ֔ר <S%H4929><s%> make the watch הָקִ֙ימוּ֙ <S%H6965><s%> set up שֹֽׁמְרִ֔ים <S%H8104><s%> the watchmen הָכִ֖ינוּ <S%H3559><s%> prepare הָאֹֽרְבִ֑ים <S%H693><s%> the ambushes כִּ֚י <S%H3588><s%> for גַּם־ <S%H1571><s%> has both זָמַ֣ם <S%H2161><s%> hath both devised יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> for the LORD גַּם־ <S%H1571><s%> has both עָשָׂ֕ה <S%H6213><s%> and done אֵ֥ת <S%H853><s%> אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> What דִּבֶּ֖ר <S%H1696><s%> that which he spake אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> concerning יֹשְׁבֵ֥י <S%H3427><s%> against the inhabitants בָבֶֽל׃ <S%H894><s%> of Babylon

[שֹׁכַנְתִּי כ] (שֹׁכַנְתְּ֙ <S%H7931><s%> abide ק) עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> and מַ֣יִם <S%H4325><s%> waters רַבִּ֔ים <S%H7227><s%> upon many רַבַּ֖ת <S%H7227><s%> abundant אֽוֹצָרֹ֑ת <S%H214><s%> in treasures בָּ֥א <S%H935><s%> is come קִצֵּ֖ךְ <S%H7093><s%> thine end אַמַּ֥ת <S%H520><s%> [and] the measure בִּצְעֵֽךְ׃ <S%H1215><s%> of thy covetousness

נִשְׁבַּ֛ע <S%H7650><s%> hath sworn יְהוָ֥ה <S%H3068><s%> The LORD צְבָא֖וֹת <S%H6635><s%> of hosts בְּנַפְשׁ֑וֹ <S%H5315><s%> by himself כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> for אִם־ <S%H518><s%> lo מִלֵּאתִ֤יךְ <S%H4390><s%> [saying] Surely I will fill אָדָם֙ <S%H120><s%> thee with men כַּיֶּ֔לֶק <S%H3218><s%> as with caterpillers וְעָנ֥וּ <S%H6030><s%> and they shall lift up עָלַ֖יִךְ <S%H5921><s%> over הֵידָֽד׃ <S%H1959><s%> a shout ס

עֹשֵׂ֥ה <S%H6213><s%> He hath made אֶ֙רֶץ֙ <S%H776><s%> the earth בְּכֹח֔וֹ <S%H3581><s%> by his power מֵכִ֥ין <S%H3559><s%> he hath established תֵּבֵ֖ל <S%H8398><s%> the world בְּחָכְמָת֑וֹ <S%H2451><s%> by his wisdom וּבִתְבוּנָת֖וֹ <S%H8394><s%> by his understanding נָטָ֥ה <S%H5186><s%> and hath stretched out שָׁמָֽיִם׃ <S%H8064><s%> the heaven

לְק֨וֹל <S%H6963><s%> [his] voice תִּתּ֜וֹ <S%H5414><s%> When he uttereth הֲמ֥וֹן <S%H1995><s%> [there is] a multitude מַ֙יִם֙ <S%H4325><s%> of waters בַּשָּׁמַ֔יִם <S%H8064><s%> in the heavens וַיַּ֥עַל <S%H5927><s%> to ascend נְשִׂאִ֖ים <S%H5387><s%> and he causeth the vapours מִקְצֵה־ <S%H7097><s%> from the ends אָ֑רֶץ <S%H776><s%> of the earth בְּרָקִ֤ים <S%H1300><s%> lightnings לַמָּטָר֙ <S%H4306><s%> with rain עָשָׂ֔ה <S%H6213><s%> he maketh וַיֹּ֥צֵא <S%H3318><s%> and bringeth forth ר֖וּחַ <S%H7307><s%> the wind מֵאֹצְרֹתָֽיו׃ <S%H214><s%> out of his treasures

נִבְעַ֤ר <S%H1197><s%> is brutish כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> All אָדָם֙ <S%H120><s%> Every man מִדַּ֔עַת <S%H1847><s%> by [his] knowledge הֹבִ֥ישׁ <S%H3001><s%> is confounded כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> Every צֹרֵ֖ף <S%H6884><s%> every founder מִפָּ֑סֶל <S%H6459><s%> by the graven image כִּ֛י <S%H3588><s%> for שֶׁ֥קֶר <S%H8267><s%> [is] falsehood נִסְכּ֖וֹ <S%H5262><s%> for his molten image וְלֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> is no ר֥וּחַ <S%H7307><s%> and [there is] no breath בָּֽם׃

הֶ֣בֶל <S%H1892><s%> They [are] vanity הֵ֔מָּה <S%H1992><s%> like מַעֲשֵׂ֖ה <S%H4639><s%> the work תַּעְתֻּעִ֑ים <S%H8595><s%> of errors בְּעֵ֥ת <S%H6256><s%> in the time פְּקֻדָּתָ֖ם <S%H6486><s%> of their visitation יֹאבֵֽדוּ׃ <S%H6><s%> they shall perish

לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> like כְאֵ֜לֶּה <S%H428><s%> these חֵ֣לֶק <S%H2506><s%> The portion יַעֲק֗וֹב <S%H3290><s%> of Jacob כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> For יוֹצֵ֤ר <S%H3335><s%> [is] not like them for he [is] the former הַכֹּל֙ <S%H3605><s%> of all ה֔וּא <S%H1931><s%> and of וְשֵׁ֖בֶט <S%H7626><s%> of all things and [Israel is] the rod נַחֲלָת֑וֹ <S%H5159><s%> of his inheritance יְהוָ֥ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD צְבָא֖וֹת <S%H6635><s%> of hosts שְׁמֽוֹ׃ <S%H8034><s%> [is] his name ס

מַפֵּץ־ <S%H4661><s%> Thou [art] my battle axe אַתָּ֣ה <S%H859><s%> you לִ֔י כְּלֵ֖י <S%H3627><s%> [and] weapons מִלְחָמָ֑ה <S%H4421><s%> of war וְנִפַּצְתִּ֤י <S%H5310><s%> for with thee will I break in pieces בְךָ֙ גּוֹיִ֔ם <S%H1471><s%> the nations וְהִשְׁחַתִּ֥י <S%H7843><s%> and with thee will I destroy בְךָ֖ מַמְלָכֽוֹת׃ <S%H4467><s%> kingdoms

וְנִפַּצְתִּ֣י <S%H5310><s%> And with thee will I break in pieces בְךָ֔ ס֖וּס <S%H5483><s%> the horse וְרֹֽכְב֑וֹ <S%H7392><s%> and his rider וְנִפַּצְתִּ֣י <S%H5310><s%> and with thee will I break in pieces בְךָ֔ רֶ֖כֶב <S%H7393><s%> the chariot וְרֹכְבֽוֹ׃ <S%H7392><s%> and his rider

וְנִפַּצְתִּ֤י <S%H5310><s%> With thee also will I break in pieces בְךָ֙ אִ֣ישׁ <S%H376><s%> man וְאִשָּׁ֔ה <S%H802><s%> and woman וְנִפַּצְתִּ֥י <S%H5310><s%> and with thee will I break in pieces בְךָ֖ זָקֵ֣ן <S%H2205><s%> old וָנָ֑עַר <S%H5288><s%> and young וְנִפַּצְתִּ֣י <S%H5310><s%> and with thee will I break in pieces בְךָ֔ בָּח֖וּר <S%H970><s%> the young man וּבְתוּלָֽה׃ <S%H1330><s%> and the maid
